author: rabk295
title: Great "set." (Is it a set???)
review:
Wow. This is probably the best of the 4 battle packs. The only one possibly better is the Dwarf Battle pack, 'cause they're so hard to come by, those dwarves! It comes with 5 cool minifigures, and it is definitely worth buying. On to pros and cons:

Pros:

3 troll shields, which are very hard to get.
1 of the shoulder protectors (very cool!).
2 of each color troll helmets, + 1 other type.
2 silver troll swords, 1 double-bladed axe, 1 large axe, and 1 tall pike thingy.
2 ripped up brown capes, not in many other sets (just the Troll Fortress I think).
Both types of troll torsos.

Cons:

The price. It costs $15 in the U.S., meaning $3 for each fig.
It should come with 1 silver sword and 1 bronze sword, not 2 silvers, IMO.
It could have come with the new troll king head, not just the old ones.

Other than that, this is a great set that is a castle fan must get.

-rabk294

author: legoguy2805
title: Troll army
review:
I got this set for christmas 2009. The trolls come complete, and include weapons like axes, swords, pikes and sheilds. A rat also comes with the set, which is good. The 'Elite Trolls', according to the description, incude capes and gold helmets.

Pros:
Lots of different trolls, and two elites

Cons:
Expensive

Overall, a decent set, 4/5.

author: OrangeBlooded31
title: Army Builder
review:
I picked this set up of of Ebay for $30. My  "value for money" is based off of this, because if you're just looking to buy the set now, it's going to cost you!

 

My only complaint with the actual product is that everything comes pre-assembled. It would have been nice to put the Trolls together and actually have something to build. This would have added alot to the item.

 

Still a nice piece. It is a nice army builder for those that play, and this set gives alot of figures for those who like to create displays.

author: AETerry
title: Troll Warriors
review:
I have really liked the look of the troll warriors but not necessarilly the sets that they come in. The battle pack served as a great way to get a bunch of these new minifigs without some awful looking set that they come in.

 

I'm really very pleased by their looks, the design of the weapons, armor and sheilds. It's just a beautiful little set if you can find them still for retail and not at inflated e-bay prices.
